name: Battlefield 3: Back to Karkand
description:
Battlefield 3: Back to Karkand is a shooter game developed by Electronic Arts DICE. It came out on 06-12-2011. Electronic Arts published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Battlefield 3: Back to Karkand is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
Johan Skugge and Jukka Rintamäki scored the game.
